(1823x1+0)/1 mod 4096 = 1823. (1823x3+1)/2 mod 2048 = 687. (1823x9+5)/4 mod 1024 = 7. (1823x27+19)/8 mod 512 = 11. (1823x81+65)/16 mod 256 = 17. (1823x243+211)/32 mod 128 = 26. (1823x243+211)/64 mod 64 = 13. (1823x729+697)/128 mod 32 = 20. (1823x729+697)/256 mod 16 = 10. (1823x729+697)/512 mod 8 = 5. (1823x2187+2603)/1024 mod 4 = 0. (1823x2187+2603)/2048 mod 2 = 0. (1823x2187+2603)/4096 mod 1 = 0.
